Posts.Title: YOU made an Inspire glossary!

Posts.Content: Please know that if your medical insurance/plan changes (or there’s a glitch in the system) you may lose all of your history and reports in an instant if you rely on a “patient portal.” This happened to me a few years ago when a very well-known system “merged” with mine. My “portal” now consists only of minor things such as blood work and appointments—no diagnosis, surgeries, family history—nothing... ğŸ“‰ğŸ—’ğŸš« AND when I requested my records by mail, zero information had been transferred in any format.
Posts.Title: Mastering your medical paperwork: Tips from a professional organizer
